name: Message (Noam Raz)
description:
Help The message get to it's detination address by fighting content revealing and internet slowness!

When You Send your Friend a message on WhatsApp, how it's going from your phone to his phone? Through The internet, Right? Right, but Tottaly not only... Help your Small Message Friend Get To It's Destination, You'll Learn About Internet, Make The Internet Smooth and Faster, **And Keep It Alive.**

Simple Instructions

  • Instructions for Using the Game:
  • Right Arrow / D - Character Moves Right.
  • Left Arrow / A - Character Moves Left.
  • Space - Character Jumps.
  • For Killing Enemies, Jump On their Head (Not Working With Bosses)

Important information: You Maybe Not Hear The Sounds on the Web Version of the game because google are Sometimes blocking Sounds from that type of games.

We made the level short because of the time We didn't have, but We made a Touch from every Feature (Enemies, Bosses, etc.).

What Not Made by Us in these Game

      1. Keep It Alive - The song in the Credits.

Credits:

  • Noam Raz - Manager & Programmer
  • QuantumCookie - Programmer & Art Maker
  • SociaalNiels - Music Maker
